O jogo é muito bom mas, o jogo tem muitos problemas, como por exemplo a mal otimização, e também o desbalanceamento, o jogo é muito mais favorável pros survivos do que pros killers, a ideia do jogo era fazer os killers caçarem os sobreviventes e sacrificá-los/mata-los, porém o que vemos no jogo hj é totalmente ao contrario, os survs estão correndo atras do killers, isso prejudica muito a jogabilidade e deixa o jogo menos interessante, se vc estiver pensando em comprar o jogo, eu aconselho a vc esperar uma promoção, pois o preço do jogo fica bem mais acessível.

.
Original review: 
If you are looking to have fun for a few hours, yes, this game is good. but once you get good at DBD, it gets boring.! 

There are too many problems with this game, 
1. Its unbalanced. 

2. The devs don't play their own game, so they don't understand it and they wont listen to the community. Each and every update released (which takes forever) makes the game more unbalanced. 

3. The community - specially survivors are super toxic. After getting to a certain rank you will see the same 4 perks in almost every game. which makes it boring. This again circles back to the devs not putting effort into changing the meta. 

4. There is no set Win / Lose condition, which makes it weird for the game with SBMM (Skill based match making) 

5. BUGS!!!!! LOTS OF BUGS

and finally 6. Hackers! Its really easy to hack in this game and no effort has been put from the Devs to take care of this.  So, the higher your rank, you will be playing against more hackers. 

So, basically this game is a polished turd with lazy devs which has a big fan base because of the licensed characters. 

A lot of other asymmetrical horror games are coming out soon, and i think this game won't survive for long!

Худшая игра с полным отсутствием баланса в игре в сторону выживших, это как Маньяк первого ранга пишу.  Киллер не имеет ниодного шанса против пати, совершающего генраш. Максимальное количество багов и читеров в игре. Постоянное ухудшение положения маньяков по отношению к сурвам, постоянные нерфы. Разработчики не скрывают этого. Если сделать математический расчет, то при генраше маньяк сразу же проиграл, никак эта проблема годами не устраняется, минус 4 сурва в игре делать можно, но только если сурвы сами соизволят побегать с вами. Вообще КИЛЛЕР, который казалось бы должен диктовать условия в этой помойке ПОЛНОСТЬЮ зависит от воли сурвов, в том числе и его конечные баллы за матч. Я сыграл много матчей, проманьяк и торжественно заявляю всем раздумывающим новичкам НЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ этот мусор, если вы желаете играть за маньяка, довольно много лишних нервов потратите.

tl:dr; it's a fun game, but I wouldn't recommend it if you want to be playing something for the rest of your days.

This is from someone who hasnt played anything else of this genre, but from what I understand this game doesnt have too much competition at the moment anyway.

Pros
-Gameplay is fun from both perspectives, theres a lot that goes into allowing those moments of "wow, that was pretty cool" and most of the time (which Ill talk more about later) getting outplayed is generally a matter of your opponent actually being good at the game. This is accompanied by a lot of really well thought out gameplay systems that offer some tense moments and narrow escapes.
-The perks and characters are pretty expansive, and progression is fun for the most part. There are a lot of cool perks that drastically change up how you play, and you don't need to buy dlc to build a good/fun build.
-There are custom games, which allow you access to any perks you dont have, including dlc perks which is nice.
-The way fighting against different killers changes up your playstyle is a pretty fun dynamic, making every game feel different. To give an example, one of the killers can extend his special ability by hitting multiple survivors, so in that case you want to stay spread out, and another can throw hatchets, so there is a whole other skill to dodging those hatchets.
-This is a live service game, so it gets constant updates and has multiple maps, survivors, killers, etc.
-A lot of the killers/survivors are stolen from popular media, for exmaple you can play as a demogorgon, nemesis, bill overbeck, freddy, pinhead, etc. I havnt played/watched any of these things, but if youre into that stuff then theres probably one of your favorite characters thats playable in this game.

Cons
-Matchmaking is a joke. Theres no other way to put this. You'll either be put against some 4000 hour player running the most sweaty and broken builds possible or some poor first time player who hasnt even leveled his perks yet. This would be fine if there was a competitive mode or something, but theres not, making the mmr and sbmm just feel frustrating.
-Leveling your perks requires playing games, and its kinda unfun in the beginning when youre without perks and everyone else is. Also, the leveling currency used is general, which means that if im focusing on leveling one thing, I cant level another thing. This means that me, who mostly plays survivor since im playing with a friend, still doesnt have any killers leveled since i mostly play survivor. This is a small complaint, but it would be nice to see a seperate currency for leveling survivors and killers.
-As mentioned, there's dlc in this game. Which is fine, i have 2000 hours on destiny so i have long since stopped complaining about dlc, but this is a paid game with a LOT of dlc. Luckily maps arent locked behind dlc, but most of the survivors/killers are. This includes most of the previously mentioned characters from existing franchises, but dlc characters are also just generally more interesting than others. To name an exmaple, I played against a 9 foot tall cowboy who has a damn gun that launches harpoons and reels survivors in, and i was like "wow, i wanna play him" but nope, $7 or nothing. In fairness, you can buy killers/survivors with ingame currency, but its an estimated 70ish hours to unlock 1 killer/survivor.
-this game is super unbalanced. There have been so many games that have just ended with that "oh well, not much to be done there" feeling once the perks are revealed, and the devs have shown that theyre not great at fixing this problem.
-It seems like the servers are pretty shit, I've been kicked for maintinance reasons a couple times, and a friend's reported a lot of weird hitreg and things of that genre (he plays this game much more than me).
-Lore, from what I can see ingame, isnt very deep. It seems like most killers are just "they had an abusive parent or witnessed something messed up, snapped, and killed a bunch of people" and survivors are just "they had a kind of interesting life that fits their abilities and one day they disappeared and were never heard of again". Maybe theres comics or something out there, but ingame presentation is meh.

In short, gameplay and progression is fun for people (like me) who aren't particularly competitive, but if you want to get involved in the community/get really good at this game, it seems like a pretty frustrating route to take.

kept on thinking that the devs would eventually listen to the community but it never happened; the same problems have been in the game for the last 3 years and even though the community have been voicing these problems consistently for the 3 years, they still managed to make the game even worse and just making stupid decisions overall. good game terrible devs

Well, I don't know if they kicked out all of the devs who were ruining an otherwise good game with even more unseen potential, or what, but it looks like things are going in the right direction now. So I'm revising my review; some of the upcoming changes will really shake things up for everyone and reduce the grind, so I look forward to DBD's future once anew.

扮演屠夫有各种各样的能力，但都会被人类千篇一律的操作一顿爆馏，玩人类不找队友开黑游戏体验也会很差，服务器也有很多问题，不能说问题大到影响游戏，但是总是在窗子板子恶心人。对屠夫仅剩的活路很少了，要么幻神，要么拔线，要么就得精通人皇心里，各种博弈，掌握全局人类动向，技能还得得心应手，图腾不是路灯……还有恶心人的匹配机制，用隐藏分来强行延长上端时间，导致段位和游玩时间（还有血压）成正比，而不是游玩的熟练度和操作……
